name: YonwerSelect
description:
That's a lot of birds!
...Oh, there are four birds in one color!
Let's find it and grab it!

Let's Yonwer Select!
( Yonwer / 四羽 : It means "4 birds" in Japanese )

Controls

The game can be operated by touching the screen (or mouse in the case of a computer).

Features
  • Easy puzzles that anyone can do.
  • It's like brain training (...Really?)
  • Catching them fast increases the "Rate".
  • You can change skin when you unlock the achievements.

Let's go for 100 million points!
